short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin and save ChatGPT prompts as URLs for quick access with their conversation names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to pin and save ChatGPT conversations! Unlike a pinning extension that does it on the ChatGPT website, this popup allows you to be on any webpage and instantly jump right back into where you left off. Completely open source as well. The code can be found on my GitHub.
